    • Method Detail

      • buildMap

        private static long buildMap(java.lang.String[] words,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map)
        From an array of words build a map of words and usage counts.
        This is a general methods that works the same for HashMaps and TreeMaps.
        Parameters:
        words - An array of Strings containing the words.
        map - A Map of (word : count) pairs.
        Returns:
        The time, in nanoseconds, to build the map.

      • displayMap

        private static long displayMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map)
        Display the contents of a map of (word : count) pairs.
        Parameters:
        map - The Map of (word : count) pairs.
        Returns:
        The time, in nanoseconds, to display the map.

      • processInputFile

        private static java.lang.String[] processInputFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Read the named file and edit the contents.
        1. All letters are converted to lower case so that the process is case insensitive.
        2. Digits are removed (only words are processed).
        3. Punctuation marks are removed.
        4. Hyphens (dashes) are replaced with spaces.

        A String[] is created by splitting the String of words read in from the file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - The OS based name of the file to be processed.
        Returns:
        A String[] of the words in the file.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
